COMMENT_TX: Pitcher change with 2-2 count, K to reliever
Protest=H

Ball was stuck under pad of left field wall; Phillies claimed there is no ground rule for this and ball was in play; Jeff Conine did not make a play so Placido Polanco would have scored; Phillies protest was declined next week

ej,gonza002,P,marqa901,Fighting with Todd Pratt ej,pratt001,P,marqa901,Fighting with Alex Gonzalez $Brett Myers first pitch was high and tight to Alex Gonzalez who took a step towards the mound and pointed at the pitcher; catcher Todd Pratt stepped between them and exchanged angry words with Gonzalez, who swatted at Pratt; Pratt hit Gonzalez with a right cross and the benches cleared; Pratt threw several punches; Carl Pavano threw David Bell to the ground; Pratt and Gonzalez were ejected by HP umpire Alfonzo Marquez
First homer into second deck in new park
Hernandez injured calf muscle fielding dribbler. Onto 15 day DL immediately after game
ej,michj001,P,demud901,Called third strike Jason Michaels ejected by HP umpire Dana DeMuth
ej,bowal001,M,demud901,Call at HP Philies Manager Larry Bowa ejected by HP umpire Dana DeMuth
$Nomo left with split finger nail
$Lieberthal hit on RIGHT side of helmet, just above ear as he turned to his left
Foul by Izturis ruled tip that was dropped. Bowa claimed it was missed. Next pitch was homer
Debut game for Justin Germano
$As Lieberthal threw to first to finish the DP, Giles upended him and throw went way down into corner
ej,paytj001,P,hoyej901,Call at 1B Jay Payton ejected by 1B umpire James Hoye
$C.Jones left game with injured leg. Hit by pitch in left quadriceps
$LaRoche left game with injured chest
$Padilla left with tendinitis in right triceps; onto 15 day DL after game
Originally scored as E2, changed to E9 next day
$Perez tried for the runner at third, but made a bad throw on the run to a moving target. Originally scored as FC, changed next day to E6, 2 UR
$Thome's 400th career homer
Game called for rain after long delay
Broken hand for Santiago, out for rest of year
Debut game for Mike Tonis
